name: Firefly (itch) (YourCousin)
description:
Firefly is a game heavily inspired by flappy bird 

The gameplay is simple, help your friend firefly to dodge the incoming obstacles as he makes his way through the night

Similar to flappy bird,  but with added difficulty

You can only see what firefly's light illuminates

Try to beat your friend's or your own score

Have Fun!

And yes, the game will receive more updates and possibly a "watch add" button if it seems fair
